name: Island Car Racing - Speed Action & Style
name_original: Island Car Racing - Speed Action & Style
description:
Race against time on a beautiful Island Road track with amazing 3D graphics and best experience of real Car racing physics.

Discover an almost-real car fast action adventure in the virtual 3d classic racing game! Download it free right now and start the thrilling race!. Race anywhere and anytime and experience the feel of a real sports car control. Complete the lap in your best time to extend game while your enjoy the sunny day with beautiful hills on a real looking asphalt road track.

Features:
- Cool 3D graphics and visual effects
- Free to play
- Real Engine Sound and gas pumping effects
- Simple, yet Engaging Game play!
- Responsive Controls!
- Race against Time and break your own Record
- New Surprises in Upcoming Updates!

How to Play:
- Tilt your cell phone or tablet to steer left or right
- Touch anywhere on screen right half to accelerate the speed
- Touch anywhere on screen left half to apple brakes or reverse
